channel.title: Weeks 13-15: Project Presentations on PSU Astro 528
channel.description: Recent content in Weeks 13-15: Project Presentations on PSU Astro 528

item.title: Learning goals
item.description: Weeks 13-15 Project Characterize peformance of class project Characterize performance as a function of problem size Characterize performance as a function of number of processors (both strong and weak scaling) Predict how much performance could be improved with further optimization/parallelization Make code easy for others to reuse Make benchmarks easy to reproduce (for their own system) Project Presentations Explain reasons for observed performance Share lessons learned in course of class project
